original_text: And Saul asked counsel of God, Shall I go down after the Philistines? wilt thou deliver them into the hand of Israel? But he answered him not that day.
korean_text: 사울이 하나님께 묻자오되 내가 블레셋 사람들을 추격하리이까 주께서 그들을 이스라엘의 손에 넘기시겠나이까 하되 그 날에 대답하지 아니하시는지라

sentences.original_text: And Saul asked counsel of God
Shall I go down after the Philistines?
wilt thou deliver them into hand of Israel?
But he answered him not that day.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 날에는 그가 그에게 응답하지 아니하셨더라
